page.title: 14Lymm Guardian July 1985.
page.content:
{ {LYMM LOCAL HEADLINES 1000 people sign a petition against the application to convert two village centre shops into office accommodation
Oughtrington High School last Summer Fair raises over Â£2000.
Cotebrook Home Day Centre is almost completed and now voluntary helpers are required.The Centre hopes to provide activities such as swimming, drama,board games,cooking,yoga and discussion groups.Local disabled persons will be able to use the facilities as soon as enough volunteers are found.
